channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：🇷🇺 普京警告西方面临核战争风险普京总统警告说，如果西方将乌克兰冲突升级，就会面临 "真正的 "核战争风险，他在向俄罗斯人发表的年度演讲中表明了挑衅和有恃无恐的立场。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇷🇺 Putin warns West of nuclear war risk

President Putin has warned of a "real" risk of nuclear war if the West escalates the conflict in Ukraine, offering a defiant and emboldened stance in his annual speech to Russians.

📹 POOL VIA VGTRK
📸 POOL / AFP#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/0iDprzgaEI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇫🇷 法国参议院投票决定将堕胎 "自由 "写入宪法 参议院支持政府将堕胎自由写入宪法的动议。参议院 @justindavis70 @luciecjl#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇫🇷 France's Senate votes to make abortion constitutional 'freedom'

The Senate backed a government move to enshrine the freedom to have an abortion in the constitution. It will now be voted on at a special congress

📹 SENATE @justindavis70 @luciecjl#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/3KmXeUeYeQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 周四，欧洲航空业从科维德疫情中反弹，英国航空公司（British Airways）所有者IAG和法荷竞争对手法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）公布了2023年的丰厚利润。
item.description:
Europe's aviation industry extended a bounceback from the Covid pandemic on Thursday, as British Airways owner IAG and Franco-Dutch rival Air France-KLM posted bumper 2023 profits.https://t.co/vzHha925tL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 圣路易斯大区区长周四告诉法新社，至少有 24 人在塞内加尔北部海域因满载货物的船只沉没而溺水身亡。
item.description:
At least 24 people seeking to reach Europe drowned off northern Senegal when their loaded vessel sank, the governor of the Saint Louis region told AFP on Thursday.https://t.co/nDe9cfgYnV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在阿姆斯特丹以荷兰天才梵高命名的博物馆举办的一场新展览中，一位加拿大华裔画家以其富有表现力的笔触、生动的色彩和多灾多难的生活与梵高相提并论。
item.description:
A Canadian-Chinese painter whose expressive brush strokes, vivid colours and troubled life drew comparisons with Van Gogh stars in a new show at the Amsterdam museum named after the Dutch genius.https://t.co/h2Otzv4nGY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：为重振低迷的房地产市场，香港取消了三大房地产交易税，推翻了十多年前为抑制投机和控制高房价而推出的措施。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hong Kong has axed three major property transaction taxes in a bid to revive its depressed housing market, reversing measures introduced more than a decade ago to curb speculation and rein in sky-high prices. pic.twitter.com/h7A1b3kX0X

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 周四，在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织第十三次部长级会议（MC13）进入了预定的最后一天，但一些重大问题仍悬而未决。
item.description:
The World Trade Organization's 13th ministerial conference (MC13) in Abu Dhabi entered its last scheduled day on Thursday, with major issues still stuck in the weeds.https://t.co/3Zg9X3pTsa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：加拿大城市蒙特利尔正经历着近乎夏天般的酷热，气温高达 15 摄氏度，尽管冬天尚未过去。
item.description:
VIDEO: The Canadian city of Montreal is experiencing almost summer-like heat, with temperatures hitting 15 degrees Celsius, even though winter is not yet over. pic.twitter.com/oGhJAqbWLF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：大约 180 年前，得克萨斯州曾是一个独立国家，现在有一群人希望恢复这一地位，主张与美国离婚，他们称之为 "Texit"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Texas, last an independent country around 180 years ago, now boasts a pocket of people who want that status back, advocating a divorce from the United States they call "Texit" pic.twitter.com/V44es3nUne

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德甲领头羊拜耳勒沃库森队体育总监西蒙-罗尔费斯（Simon Rolfes）周四表示，他对教练哈维-阿隆索（Xabi Alonso）夏天之后的去留感到 "冷静和乐观"。
item.description:
Simon Rolfes, the sporting director of Bundesliga leaders Bayer Leverkusen, said Thursday he was "calm and optimistic" coach Xabi Alonso would stay beyond the summer.#AFPSports https://t.co/XXWTzTZDha

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：在黎巴嫩南部边境，真主党和以色列几乎每天都在交火，数百名黎巴嫩人在贝鲁特北部的一个豪华滑雪胜地的纯白斜坡上滑行，他们急切地想从加沙战争的新闻中解脱出来。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hundreds of Lebanese glide on pristine white slopes at a luxury ski resort north of Beirut, eager to disconnect from news of the war in Gaza as Hezbollah and Israel exchange near-daily fire on Lebanon's southern border. pic.twitter.com/rNbyxoCdZT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 视频：雄伟的东京市政府总部大楼现在是世界上最大的永久性投影地图显示屏的所在地。
item.description:
VIDEO: The imposing towers of Tokyo's city government headquarters are now home to the world's largest permanent projection mapping display. pic.twitter.com/cdI9oNrwQw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 哈马斯管理的卫生部称，自战争开始以来，加沙已有 3 万多名巴勒斯坦人丧生。虽然调解人称以色列和哈马斯之间的停战协议可能只剩几天时间，但援助机构却发出了加沙北部即将发生饥荒的警报
item.description:
Hamas-run health ministry says over 30,000 Palestinians have been killed in Gaza since the war began.

While mediators say a truce deal between Israel and Hamas could be just days away, aid agencies sound alarm of a looming famine in Gaza's northhttps://t.co/JLherfQmI6 pic.twitter.com/zx8oePBmit

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 从濒临灭绝到澳大利亚的鳄鱼 "天堂"......在 20 世纪 70 年代受到政府保护之前，估计有 98% 的野生咸水鳄鱼已经消失。现在，有超过 10 万条 "咸水鳄 "在遥远的北部沿海和河流中捕食。
item.description:
From edge of extinction to Australia's croc 'paradise'.

Before government protection in the 1970s, an estimated 98% of the wild saltwater crocodile population had disappeared. Now over 100,000 "salties" hunt along the coasts and rivers of the far northhttps://t.co/cvYQR2WbQk pic.twitter.com/FR96hPalGH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 来自八个欧盟国家的消费者组织周四对 Meta 公司提出投诉，指控该美国公司非法处理用户数据，并利用其 "付费或同意 "系统作为隐私泄露的 "烟幕弹"。
item.description:
#BREAKING Consumer groups from eight EU countries lodged complaints on Thursday against Meta, accusing the US company of illegally processing users' data and using its "pay or consent" system as a "smokescreen" for privacy breaches pic.twitter.com/jFEOfi8hpj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 巴黎奥运会将于本周四提前一天拿到运动员村的钥匙，这增强了人们对运动员村为奥运会做好准备的信心。
item.description:
Paris Olympics are set to take the keys for the athletes' village on Thursday, a day ahead of schedule, reinforcing growing confidence that they will be ready for the Gameshttps://t.co/YoLuZgHufR pic.twitter.com/G6Jo13rQtB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚揭露前政治家被一个来自未具名国家的间谍小组培养和招募。政府面临愤怒的要求，要求说出 "叛徒 "的名字
item.description:
Australia reveals former politician was cultivated and recruited by a spy team from an unnamed country.

Government faces angry demands to name the "traitor"https://t.co/ocow7IO9u9 pic.twitter.com/7n4HlpTrX9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）和华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney）已同意合并其印度媒体业务，从而在这个世界上人口最多的国家创建一个价值 85 亿美元的娱乐巨头。
item.description:
India's Reliance Industries and Walt Disney have agreed to merge their Indian media businesses, creating a $8.5 billion entertainment giant in the world's most populous nationhttps://t.co/95z5DVS0HT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 挪威王室表示，87岁的挪威国王哈拉尔五世健康状况不佳，他在马来西亚度假期间因感染而被迫住院治疗，目前病情正在 "好转"。
item.description:
King Harald V, aged 87 and in poor health, is "improving" from an infection that forced him to be hospitalised while on holiday in Malaysia, the Royal House of Norway sayshttps://t.co/S8XmtbHt6Y pic.twitter.com/M5hHIXiEs9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 前西印度群岛球星克里斯-盖尔希望 T20 世界杯能帮助板球运动打入利润丰厚的美国体育市场
item.description:
Former West Indies star Chris Gayle hopes the T20 World Cup will help cricket crack the lucrative American sports markethttps://t.co/OsTBPZyugp pic.twitter.com/p5KmzMkHIM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 韩国卫生部长威胁说，如果医生不结束使医院陷入混乱的罢工，他将采取法律行动
item.description:
South Korea's health minister threatens legal action if doctors do not end a strike that has plunged hospitals into chaoshttps://t.co/NZ5dtRdKFy pic.twitter.com/npuXsUx0Tj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 新西兰周四成为最后一个将哈马斯全部认定为 "恐怖实体 "的西方国家之一，称10月7日的袭击打破了哈马斯的政治和军事羽翼可以分离的观念。
item.description:
#UPDATE New Zealand on Thursday became one of the last Western countries to designate all of Hamas as a "terrorist entity", saying the attacks of October 7 had shattered the notion its political and military wings could be separated.

"The organisation as a whole bears… pic.twitter.com/DPA3w5iFVI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）被宣布 "身体健康，适合履行职责"，没有新的健康问题。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden declared "fit for duty" with no new health worries.

The keenly awaited annual medical examination comes just weeks after a special counsel report portrayed him as elderly and forgetfulhttps://t.co/fzZhl25mb3 pic.twitter.com/8CB4SJndfs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: #新西兰指定 "整个哈马斯 "为恐怖主义实体
item.description:
#BREAKING New Zealand designates 'entirety of Hamas' as terrorist entity pic.twitter.com/0nWIFVHBWY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州有七处野火肆虐，其中一处是该州近代史上最大的野火。
item.description:
Seven wildfires are raging in Texas, including one of the largest in recent state history

Properties have been destroyed and multiple evacuation orders issued, particularly in the northhttps://t.co/i3kYx0WZvh pic.twitter.com/UwdXmlx294

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 🇺🇸 一个小镇如何成为保守派活动家推动全美禁止堕胎的 "棋子"🖋️ @andrewmarszal
item.description:
🇺🇸How one small town became a "pawn" in the push by conservative activists to ban abortions across the United States
🖋️ @andrewmarszal https://t.co/gwccUs2fvc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔政府周三提出了一项大赦法案，旨在为该国政治带来 "安抚 "与 "和解"，此前，本月总统选举的推迟引发了数十年来最大的危机。
item.description:
Senegal's government put forward an amnesty bill Wednesday aimed at bringing "appeasement" and "reconciliation" to the country's politics, after the postponement of this month's presidential election sparked the biggest crisis in decades.https://t.co/AHImGeJZrW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 美国最高法院周三同意听取唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的申诉，即作为前总统，他可以免于起诉，这进一步推迟了对他密谋推翻 2020 年大选的指控的审判。
item.description:
#UPDATE The US Supreme Court agreed on Wednesday to hear Donald Trump's claim that as a former president he is immune from prosecution, further delaying his trial on charges of conspiring to overturn the 2020 election https://t.co/E8G6YQsg3h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一份官方调查报告称，为防止去年在希腊附近海域发生的移民船悲剧重演（该悲剧造成约 600 人丧生），需要改变使欧盟边境和海岸警卫机构依赖于国家当局的规则。
item.description:
To prevent a repeat of the migrant ship tragedy off Greece last year, which cost some 600 lives, rules that make the EU's border and coast guard agency dependent on national authorities need to change, an official probe says.https://t.co/uYivOPPoTO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 29, 2024

item.title: 加纳议会周三通过了一项法案，严格限制男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者的权利和宣传，引起了活动人士的斥责，美国也警告说，这项立法威胁到了这个西非国家所有公民的自由。
item.description:
Ghana's parliament passed a bill on Wednesday to severely restrict LGBTQ rights and advocacy, prompting rebukes from activists and a US warning that the legislation threatened freedoms of all citizens in the west African nation.https://t.co/wpI2QT6Hul

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 28, 2024
